0: RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE OVERALL SITUATION OF THE POWER PLANTS LOCATED IN THE LUZON GRID, CONSIDERING THE SPATE AND OVERLAPPING EXTENT OF POWER PLANT SHUTDOWNS, INCLUDING THE MASSIVE MAINTENANCE SHUTDOWNS OF AT LEAST TWENTY (20) POWER PLANTS DURING SUMMERTIME AND OTHER CONSEQUENT SHUTDOWNS THAT WOULD DEFINITELY COST IMMENSE ELECTRICITY RATE HIKES TO THE DETRIMENT OF OUR CONSUMERS, WITH THE END IN VIEW THAT PRO-PEOPLE MEASURES AND REFORMS BE INSTITUTED TO PROTECT THE CONSUMERS FROM THESE SEEMINGLY COLLUSIVE AND MANIPULATIVE PRACTICES

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00928
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE OVERALL SITUATION OF THE POWER PLANTS LOCATED IN THE LUZON GRID, CONSIDERING THE SPATE AND OVERLAPPING EXTENT OF POWER PLANT SHUTDOWNS, INCLUDING THE MASSIVE MAINTENANCE SHUTDOWNS OF AT LEAST TWENTY (20) POWER PLANTS DURING SUMMERTIME AND OTHER CONSEQUENT SHUTDOWNS THAT WOULD DEFINITELY COST IMMENSE ELECTRICITY RATE HIKES TO THE DETRIMENT OF OUR CONSUMERS, WITH THE END IN VIEW THAT PRO-PEOPLE MEASURES AND REFORMS BE INSTITUTED TO PROTECT THE CONSUMERS FROM THESE SEEMINGLY COLLUSIVE AND MANIPULATIVE PRACTICES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.
DATE FILED : 2017-04-19
